transArray.content: The location is very good, very close to Zhushikou subway station. Because there is no fixed view room, I want to see the top floor scenery before leaving. Ms. Zhao Juan at the front desk is very enthusiastic and took me to visit and take pictures. The hotel grows a lot of melons and fruits on the roof, and you can eat them after you pick them off and wash them. I will try them next time.
